plot: Surviving members of an aristocratic Welsh family are threatened by a legendary monster when they venture out on chilly, foggy nights.
title: The Undying Monster
plot_es: Surviving members of an aristocratic Welsh family are threatened by a legendary monster when they venture out on chilly, foggy nights.
plot_en: Surviving members of an aristocratic Welsh family are threatened by a legendary monster when they venture out on chilly, foggy nights.
